thread.title: Nice place to stay; good location
thread.title_full: Nice place to stay; good location - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: terrier222
title: Nice place to stay; good location
text: Very convenient to Empire State Bldg & subway, bit of a walk to Time Square & Theater, but we like walking.. Room & Bath is smallish as usual in NYC, but very clean and well kept. Breakfast is ok but crowded. "Business" room is a cubby with a screen & printer.
